# [译文：Tips to Comment Your Code ](http://xjwsn.blog.163.com/blog/static/127884875201249113546447/) 

This article was written by José M. Aguilar in Spanish on his excellent blog [Variable Not Found](http://www.variablenotfound.com/2007/12/13-consejos-para-comentar-tu-cdigo.html)

下面的13条贴士可以告诉我们怎样注释你的源代码可以让它更容易理解和持续维护...
name: Bengle's personal wiki
